item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Install Docker Natively on Android Phone and Use It as a Home Server (52 points | 27 comments)
2. Show HN: BunkerWeb – The Open-Source Web Application Firewall (WAF) (49 points | 4 comments)
3. The Unplanned Impact of Mathematics (11 points | discuss)
4. We fixed our documentation with the Diátaxis framework (14 points | 3 comments)
5. Show HN: Hacker Herald – like HN but with crowdsourced pics and subtitles (117 points | 42 comments)
6. ExxonMobil's Alleged Hack-for-Hire Campaign Targeting Climate Activists (90 points | 7 comments)
7. Show HN: Prompt Engine – Auto pick LLMs based on your prompts (44 points | 10 comments)
8. Trailbase: Fast, single-file, open-source app server built using Rust and SQLite (246 points | 84 comments)
9. Debian opens a can of username worms (75 points | 96 comments)
10. Romania cancels election after systems targeted in cyberattacks (13 points | 3 comments)
11. RNA-targeting CRISPR reveals that noncoding RNAs are not 'junk' (27 points | 19 comments)
12. ChatGPT Pro (762 points | 1082 comments)
13. Portland airport grows with expansive mass timber roof canopy (334 points | 209 comments)
14. TikTok divestment law upheld by federal appeals court (19 points | 2 comments)
15. RankScience (YC W17) is hiring to supercharge SEO for startups ( | hide)
16. Can a Comma Solve a Crime? (19 points | 12 comments)
17. Intel’s board, and an example of when boards and short-termism fail (277 points | 195 comments)
18. Show HN: Piazza, syncing the web in a vectorized DB (6 points | 3 comments)
19. Constraints Are Good: Python's Metadata Dilemma (10 points | discuss)
20. The 70% problem: Hard truths about AI-assisted coding (430 points | 346 comments)
21. Contradictions in Photography Advice (25 points | 39 comments)
22. Gordon Letwin OS/2 Usenet post (1995) (77 points | 56 comments)
23. There Are No More Dogs in Antarctica (96 points | 70 comments)
24. Reverse engineering the Ravensburger TipToi pen (67 points | 38 comments)
25. Gitlab names Bill Staples as new CEO (240 points | 212 comments)
26. The Problem with Sci-Fi Body Armor (99 points | 27 comments)
27. Rivian Is Opening Its Charging Network to Other EVs (25 points | 14 comments)
28. Sensible SQLite Defaults (14 points | 2 comments)
29. Lossless Log Aggregation – Reduce Log Volume by 99% Without Dropping Data (103 points | 63 comments)
30. PaliGemma 2: Powerful Vision-Language Models, Simple Fine-Tuning (203 points | 24 comments)
